sentences.en: I will assess what is the big profits or Democratic, then decide how to do.
sentences.cn: 我会衡量一下是利大还是敝大, 然后再决定怎么做.

sentences.en: I've heard they're getting more democratic lately.
sentences.cn: 我听说他们近来也渐渐流于平民化了.

sentences.en: Jury institution is a democratic system of jurisdiction, in which the jurors and judges executors.
sentences.cn: 陪审员与法官是同一审判权的行使者, 其相互关系是以微观分权的方式实现权力制衡.

sentences.en: Mr Saakashvili is an impetuous nationalist who has lately tarnished his democratic credentials.
sentences.cn: 萨卡什维利是一名激进的民族主义分子.

sentences.en: Self - governed by villagers is a great democratic reform of Chinese farmers.
sentences.cn: 村民自治是当代中国农民的伟大创造.

sentences.en: Solis is a former Democratic Congresswoman from California.
sentences.cn: HildaSolis在副总统Biden的主持下宣誓就职.

sentences.en: Such cases are likely to occur even after democratic election.
sentences.cn: 在实行民选之后,这种现象还有可能发生.

sentences.en: The latest research suggests a more prosaic, democratic, even puritanical view of the world.
sentences.cn: 最新的研究令我们对世界的看法呈现出更加平淡 、 更加大众, 更加严谨的色彩.

sentences.en: The media beast will undoubtedly seize on any signs of discord between the two Democratic families.
sentences.cn: 如果奥巴马和希拉里出现任何不和迹象,媒体都不会放过这个机会,定会大做文章.

sentences.en: the role of the media in the democratic process
sentences.cn: 民主进程中媒体的作用

sentences.en: The teacher's democratic attitude made her popular among her pupils.
sentences.cn: 该教师平等待人的态度时她受到了学生的爱戴.

sentences.en: There is much democratic insistence on the worthiness of every level of birth and work.
sentences.cn: 很多民众坚持认为每个层次的出身和工作都值得尊重.

sentences.en: Voters can also nominate their own candidates at this democratic consultation ( min zhu xieshang ).
sentences.cn: 投票人也可以在会上提名他们自己的候选人.
